name: Tomato - Healthy
description: Represents a healthy, disease-free tomato leaf. This indicates the plant is growing vigorously, free from pathogens and pests, and has access to adequate light, water, and nutrients necessary for robust growth and fruit production.
symptoms: Leaves are a uniform, rich green color and fully expanded.
The leaf surface is turgid (firm), may have a slightly fuzzy texture (due to trichomes).
Free of any spots, lesions, yellowing, or distortion.
Stems are strong and new growth is active.

advanced_stage.description: Maturing fruit, senescence can be natural but plant remains disease-free.

causes: This is a healthy state, not a disease. It is 'caused' by providing optimal growing conditions.

favorable_conditions.environment: Full sun (6-8 hours), well-drained fertile soil (pH 6.0-6.8), consistent moisture, balanced fertilization.

diagnosis.field_diagnosis: Uniform green color, absence of spots/wilting/pests.

prevention: Provide optimal care: sun, soil, water.
life_cycle: Annual cycle: Seed -> Vegetative -> Flowering -> Fruit -> Senescence

dataset_metadata.intended_use: Machine learning training, research, and educational purpose
